DOC.detailed_description: This open-label ( identity study drug know volunteer study staff ) , single-center study evaluate oral bioavailability ( ie , absorption distribution within body ) pharmacokinetics ( blood level ) single dose 1 fixed-dose combination ( FDC ) tablet canagliflozin metformin IR ( abbreviate 1 CANA/MET IR FDC tablet ) take healthy volunteer without food ( fast state ) food ( fed state ) . Healthy volunteer participate study randomly ( chance ) assign receive Treatment A ( 1 CANA/MET IR FDC tablet take healthy volunteer fast state ) follow approximately 14 day later Treatment B ( 1 CANA/MET IR FDC tablet take healthy volunteer feed state ) Treatment B follow approximately 14 day later Treatment A .
